summary: checks Perl syntax before allowing file write
name: perl_synwrite.vim
description:
This plugin causes write attempts to fail if the contents of the buffer produce an error when run through "perl -c"

The plugin uses can use autocommands for the BufWriteCmd and FileWriteCmd events, but by default only provides a :Write command to check-then-write.
install_details: Put this file in one of the locations described in :help ftplugin such as "~/.vim/after/ftplugin";  if you want autocommands, which are quirky, define perl_synwrite_au = 1

versions.release_notes:
